summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2503, for the improvement of 22nd Avenue North from Boyer Avenue to East Newton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 28420 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
